languages.text: "И третья плохая новость! Последняя, по счастью. Потери в команде превышают две тысячи человек. Нам не хватит рабочих рук для нормального полета, если эти потери не восполнить. В системе, где мы находимся, есть большая населенная планета — Райкад Минорис. Там наверняка найдется достаточно рабочих, но есть нюанс дипломатического толка. Планета принадлежит династии {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольных Торговцев{/g} Винтерскейл. Мы не можем просто так забрать людей, не договорившись предварительно с губернатором".

traits.locale_text: "И третья плохая новость! Последняя, по счастью. Потери в команде превышают две тысячи человек. Нам не хватит рабочих рук для нормального полета, если эти потери не восполнить. В системе, где мы находимся, есть большая населенная планета — Райкад Минорис. Там наверняка найдется достаточно рабочих, но есть нюанс дипломатического толка. Планета принадлежит династии {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольных Торговцев{/g} Винтерскейл. Мы не можем просто так забрать людей, не договорившись предварительно с губернатором".

languages.text: "And the third piece of bad news — the last one, fortunately. Crew losses have surpassed two thousand people. If we do not make good on this deficit, we will not have sufficient hands on board to facilitate normal void travel. This system contains a large inhabited planet — Rykad Minoris. We will probably be able to find sufficient workers there, but there is a matter of some diplomatic delicacy — the planet is controlled by House Winterscale, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty. We cannot simply recruit people from the planet without first coming to an agreement with the governor."
languages.original_text: "И третья плохая новость! Последняя, по счастью. Потери в команде превышают две тысячи человек. Нам не хватит рабочих рук для нормального полета, если эти потери не восполнить. В системе, где мы находимся, есть большая населенная планета — Райкад Минорис. Там наверняка найдется достаточно рабочих, но есть нюанс дипломатического толка. Планета принадлежит династии {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольных Торговцев{/g} Винтерскейл. Мы не можем просто так забрать людей, не договорившись предварительно с губернатором".

We will probably be able to find sufficient workers there, but there is a matter of some diplomatic delicacy — the planet is controlled by House Winterscale, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty. We cannot simply recruit people from the planet without first coming to an agreement with the governor."

We cannot simply recruit people from the planet without first coming to an agreement with the governor."

"And the third piece of bad news — the last one, fortunately. Crew losses have surpassed two thousand people. "And the third piece of bad news — the last one, fortunately. Crew losses have surpassed two thousand people. If we do not make good on this deficit, we will not have sufficient hands on board to facilitate normal void travel. This system contains a large inhabited planet — Rykad Minoris. We will probably be able to find sufficient workers there, but there is a matter of some diplomatic delicacy — the planet is controlled by House Winterscale, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty. We cannot simply recruit people from the planet without first coming to an agreement with the governor."

languages.text: “接下来是第三个坏消息。好消息是，这也是最后一条坏消息了。船员的损失已经超过了两千人，如果不补充人手的话，我们的船上恐怕没有足够的人维持正常的虚空航行。这个星系中有一颗大型行星叫小莱卡德，上面有人居住。我们说不定可以在那边找到足够的工人。不过这里，有个外交方面的微妙问题。那颗行星属于温特斯凯尔家族，是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}王朝的属地。我们需要先与当地总督达成协议，才能去那颗行星上招募船员。”
languages.original_text: "And the third piece of bad news — the last one, fortunately. Crew losses have surpassed two thousand people. If we do not make good on this deficit, we will not have sufficient hands on board to facilitate normal void travel. This system contains a large inhabited planet — Rykad Minoris. We will probably be able to find sufficient workers there, but there is a matter of some diplomatic delicacy — the planet is controlled by House Winterscale, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty. We cannot simply recruit people from the planet without first coming to an agreement with the governor."

traits.locale_text: “接下来是第三个坏消息。好消息是，这也是最后一条坏消息了。船员的损失已经超过了两千人，如果不补充人手的话，我们的船上恐怕没有足够的人维持正常的虚空航行。这个星系中有一颗大型行星叫小莱卡德，上面有人居住。我们说不定可以在那边找到足够的工人。不过这里，有个外交方面的微妙问题。那颗行星属于温特斯凯尔家族，是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}王朝的属地。我们需要先与当地总督达成协议，才能去那颗行星上招募船员。”

languages.text: 「そして3つ目の悪いニュースは…幸いにも、悪い話はこれが最後です。クルーの損失が2000人を超えたことです。この赤字を補填しなければ、通常のボイドトラベルを行うのに十分な人手が確保できません。この星系にはライカド・ミノリスという大きな有人惑星があります。労働者を見つけることはこの惑星でできるでしょうが、外交的な繊細な問題があります。それは、この惑星は{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}王朝のウィンタースケール家が支配しているということです。総督との合意なしに、この惑星から人を集めることはできません」
languages.original_text: "And the third piece of bad news — the last one, fortunately. Crew losses have surpassed two thousand people. If we do not make good on this deficit, we will not have sufficient hands on board to facilitate normal void travel. This system contains a large inhabited planet — Rykad Minoris. We will probably be able to find sufficient workers there, but there is a matter of some diplomatic delicacy — the planet is controlled by House Winterscale, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty. We cannot simply recruit people from the planet without first coming to an agreement with the governor."

traits.locale_text: 「そして3つ目の悪いニュースは…幸いにも、悪い話はこれが最後です。クルーの損失が2000人を超えたことです。この赤字を補填しなければ、通常のボイドトラベルを行うのに十分な人手が確保できません。この星系にはライカド・ミノリスという大きな有人惑星があります。労働者を見つけることはこの惑星でできるでしょうが、外交的な繊細な問題があります。それは、この惑星は{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}王朝のウィンタースケール家が支配しているということです。総督との合意なしに、この惑星から人を集めることはできません」

languages.text: "Und dann wäre da noch die dritte schlechte Nachricht – es ist zum Glück die letzte. Die Verluste innerhalb der Crew überschreiten zweitausend Personen. Wenn wir dieses Defizit nicht ausgleichen, haben wir nicht genügend Leute für die normale Leerenreise an Bord. In diesem System gibt es einen großen bewohnten Planeten – Rykad Minoris. Wir würden dort wahrscheinlich genügend Arbeiter finden, aber die Sache erfordert diplomatisches Feingefühl – der Planet wird vom Haus Winterzunder kontrolliert, der {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}-Dynastie. Wir können dort nicht einfach rekrutieren, ohne vorher eine Absprache mit dem Gouverneur zu treffen."
languages.original_text: "And the third piece of bad news — the last one, fortunately. Crew losses have surpassed two thousand people. If we do not make good on this deficit, we will not have sufficient hands on board to facilitate normal void travel. This system contains a large inhabited planet — Rykad Minoris. We will probably be able to find sufficient workers there, but there is a matter of some diplomatic delicacy — the planet is controlled by House Winterscale, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty. We cannot simply recruit people from the planet without first coming to an agreement with the governor."

traits.locale_text: "Und dann wäre da noch die dritte schlechte Nachricht – es ist zum Glück die letzte. Die Verluste innerhalb der Crew überschreiten zweitausend Personen. Wenn wir dieses Defizit nicht ausgleichen, haben wir nicht genügend Leute für die normale Leerenreise an Bord. In diesem System gibt es einen großen bewohnten Planeten – Rykad Minoris. Wir würden dort wahrscheinlich genügend Arbeiter finden, aber die Sache erfordert diplomatisches Feingefühl – der Planet wird vom Haus Winterzunder kontrolliert, der {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}-Dynastie. Wir können dort nicht einfach rekrutieren, ohne vorher eine Absprache mit dem Gouverneur zu treffen."

languages.text: « Et enfin, la troisième et dernière mauvaise nouvelle. Les pertes au sein de l'équipage ont dépassé les deux mille personnes. Si nous ne comblons pas ce déficit, nous n'aurons pas suffisamment de personnel à bord pour assurer notre voyage stellaire. Ce système abrite une grande planète habitée, Rykad Minoris. Nous y trouverons probablement des travailleurs en nombre satisfaisant, mais nous allons devoir faire preuve d'une certaine délicatesse diplomatique. La planète est contrôlée par la maison Winterscale, une dynastie de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g}. Nous ne pourrons pas recruter de personnel là-bas sans l'accord préalable de son gouverneur. »
languages.original_text: "And the third piece of bad news — the last one, fortunately. Crew losses have surpassed two thousand people. If we do not make good on this deficit, we will not have sufficient hands on board to facilitate normal void travel. This system contains a large inhabited planet — Rykad Minoris. We will probably be able to find sufficient workers there, but there is a matter of some diplomatic delicacy — the planet is controlled by House Winterscale, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty. We cannot simply recruit people from the planet without first coming to an agreement with the governor."

traits.locale_text: « Et enfin, la troisième et dernière mauvaise nouvelle. Les pertes au sein de l'équipage ont dépassé les deux mille personnes. Si nous ne comblons pas ce déficit, nous n'aurons pas suffisamment de personnel à bord pour assurer notre voyage stellaire. Ce système abrite une grande planète habitée, Rykad Minoris. Nous y trouverons probablement des travailleurs en nombre satisfaisant, mais nous allons devoir faire preuve d'une certaine délicatesse diplomatique. La planète est contrôlée par la maison Winterscale, une dynastie de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g}. Nous ne pourrons pas recruter de personnel là-bas sans l'accord préalable de son gouverneur. »

languages.text: «Y la tercera y, por suerte, última mala noticia: las bajas de tripulación han superado las dos mil personas. Si no compensamos este déficit, no tendremos suficientes manos a bordo para realizar el viaje por el vacío. Este sistema contiene un planeta grande habitado: Rykad Minoris. Allí deberíamos poder encontrar suficientes trabajadores, pero será un asunto delicado en el plano diplomático, pues el planeta está bajo el control de la casa Winterscale, la dinastía de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}. No podemos reclutar a su gente sin llegar a un acuerdo previo con su gobernador».
languages.original_text: "And the third piece of bad news — the last one, fortunately. Crew losses have surpassed two thousand people. If we do not make good on this deficit, we will not have sufficient hands on board to facilitate normal void travel. This system contains a large inhabited planet — Rykad Minoris. We will probably be able to find sufficient workers there, but there is a matter of some diplomatic delicacy — the planet is controlled by House Winterscale, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty. We cannot simply recruit people from the planet without first coming to an agreement with the governor."

traits.locale_text: «Y la tercera y, por suerte, última mala noticia: las bajas de tripulación han superado las dos mil personas. Si no compensamos este déficit, no tendremos suficientes manos a bordo para realizar el viaje por el vacío. Este sistema contiene un planeta grande habitado: Rykad Minoris. Allí deberíamos poder encontrar suficientes trabajadores, pero será un asunto delicado en el plano diplomático, pues el planeta está bajo el control de la casa Winterscale, la dinastía de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}. No podemos reclutar a su gente sin llegar a un acuerdo previo con su gobernador».

languages.text: "Üçüncü bir kötü haber daha var, neyse ki bu son. Tayfa zayiatı iki bini aştı. Bu açığı kapatamazsak mevcut sayımız, sıradan bir uçsuz seyahatini gerçekleştirmeye yetmeyecek. Bu sistemde büyük bir meskûn gezegen var: Rykad Minoris. Muhtemelen orada yeterli sayıda işçi buluruz ancak bazı diplomatik incelikler söz konusu. Gezegen, bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} hanedanlığı olan Winterscale Hanesi'nin kontrolünde. Valiyle anlaşmaya varmadan gezegenden adam toplayamayız."
languages.original_text: "And the third piece of bad news — the last one, fortunately. Crew losses have surpassed two thousand people. If we do not make good on this deficit, we will not have sufficient hands on board to facilitate normal void travel. This system contains a large inhabited planet — Rykad Minoris. We will probably be able to find sufficient workers there, but there is a matter of some diplomatic delicacy — the planet is controlled by House Winterscale, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} dynasty. We cannot simply recruit people from the planet without first coming to an agreement with the governor."
